title: FoodVillage
overview: This website specializes in food ordering, offering a seamless experience for users.Built using React, it leverages modern technology to enhance performance and interactivity.The primary emphasis during development was on crafting an intuitive and responsive front-end interface.
feature1: There are a variety of foods under different categories so that users can order food.
feature2: A dashboard option for users and admin so that they can manage food items.
feature3: The payment system is also integrated so that users can pay.

title: WedRoad
overview: This website is dedicated to shopping for wedding items.It utilizes React for its front-end development, ensuring a dynamic user experience.The primary focus of the development process was on the front-end aspect to create a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.
feature1: A dashboard option for crud option for the users, sellers, and admin.
feature2: Users can order products from three categories.
feature3: Authentication system applied so that valid users can do crud operation.

title: GadgetFlow
overview: This website specializes in selling electronic items, particularly laptops. It is developed using React to provide a modern and efficient front-end experience. The primary emphasis during development was on creating a user-friendly interface tailored for electronic product browsing and purchasing.
feature1: Filter and Searching facility integrated to find specific product.
feature2: Admin can manage the website and do crud operation
feature3: A bulk delete feature added so that admin can delete multiple product at a time
